SELECT e.id AS empId, e.name AS empName, e.position_code AS positionCode, pos.name AS positionName, e.dept_code AS deptCode, dept.name AS deptName, TO_CHAR(ch.commute_in, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS commuteDate, TO_CHAR(ch.commute_in, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS commuteIn, TO_CHAR(ch.commute_out, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS commuteOut FROM commute_history ch JOIN employee e ON ch.employee_id = e.id LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code pos ON e.position_code = pos.detail_code AND pos.main_code = 'POS' LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code dept ON e.dept_code = dept.detail_code AND dept.main_code = 'DEP'
AND e.id = #{empId}
AND e.name LIKE '%' || #{empName} || '%'
AND e.dept_code = #{deptCode}
AND ch.commute_in >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ch.commute_in < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
ORDER BY ch.commute_in ASC
